author: seanstapley
title: Bermuda: ADA Innovation Sandbox
description: The blockchain industry is facing severe regulatory uncertainty across many jurisdictions, inhibiting project and startup growth.
solution: Bermuda's InnoFund Incubator is an international program that supports digital asset companies looking for robust, secure foundations.
experience: Penrose Partners advises national governments on blockchain innovation and digital asset adoption and runs InnoFund's programming.
